title: Ticket #7210: Query of match ads can crash schedd
description: When the schedd is queried from match ads (i.e. condor_status -direct <schedd addr>, note no -schedd), it doesn't check whether each match_rec has a slot ad before sending the ad. When a schedd reconnects to starters after a restart, the match_rec won't have a slot ad (pointer will be NULL). These records will cause a crash in the query handling code.
remarks:
2019-Aug-15 11:29:56 by jfrey:
Other parts of the condor_reassign_slot code may need to be inspected for proper handling of missing match ads.
